name: Into the Depths (Undeadninja)
description:
Story

You woke up in a world that looks ever so familiar to you but everything about it feels off. The world you see is a lifeless version of the one you live in, collect the key and crystal fragments located in different parts of the city to unlock the door leading you closer and closer to the center of the city. The people who "live" in this undead city are familiar to seeing and meeting the living people so they are willing to help you out on your journey in hopes you find you way back to the city of the living.

- Lab 2
